I give respect when respect is due, but name another running back in the NFL that is as versatile as Jamaal Charles and has produced HUGER numbers as consistently as he does? Keep in mind he had NO O LINE. Never has had an O Line. If he had the line men that priest had, Jamaal would be the greatest that ever played. I'm tired of hearing about Adrian Peterson. data.name: GM John Dorsey Explains Importance of Justin Houston's Extension

data.message:
For all those people that think Justin Houston doesn't deserve the JJ Watt type contract he just received.

According to Pro Football Focus, Houston ranked in the top four among NFL outside linebackers in rushing the quarterback (No. 1), run defense (No. 4) and pass coverage (No. 4).

He‚Äôs the only player who can claim to be ranked in the top five in each of those categories.
For an owner as notoriously stingy as Hunt to okay a deal like this, it kinda surprises me. But with a core of Houston, Charles, Smith, Kelce, Maclin, Hali, and Poe, this team can make a deep run.
